OOC: Sorry.  I thought that the attempt was implied.  I couldn't put it in 
without it sounding stupid.  And your characters are starting to piss me off.

::Aerotaur/Terrataur::
       Aerotaur spots the grenade and stands between it and Nightlight.  His 
wings and back absorb the blast and ignite.  He falls to the floor and rolls. 
 "Nightlight..."

       Terrataur likewise sees the grenade.  "Holy hell!  That can't be 
good."  She uses her drills to dig herself a hole in the floor to get her 
away from the blast.

--part1_131.343d1c.28afe366_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
